Rebellion Record: a Diary of American Events: Index Volume 1. Frank Moore &Perseus.publish;
Van Nostrand. New York, New York. 1862.

div1.head: Index.
div1.p: Explanation of Abbreviations in the Index.
Int. stands for Introductory Address; D. for Diary of Events; Doc. for Documents; and P. for Poetry, Rumors, and Incidents.
